arachnid.name: large spider
arachnid.description: A huge spider with fangs dripping with potent venom. Its multiple eyes gleam menacingly in the dark.

goblin.description: A small, green-skinned creature with pointy ears and a foul temper. It wields a rusty dagger.
goblin.name: a grumpy goblin

howler.description: A massive, yeti-like creature standing six feet tall, its mournful howl echoes through the mountains. Its eyes gleam with savage hunger.
howler.name: a hulking howler
